title: Saudi Arabia greenlights National Privatization Strategy, targeting 18 sectors and 220+ contracts by 2030
summary_full: Saudi Arabia has officially launched its National Privatization Strategy, a key component of Vision 2030, aiming to boost infrastructure and public services. This move signifies a shift from planning to execution, with ambitious targets for private sector investment and public-private partnership contracts by 2030. The strategy seeks to enhance efficiency and create thousands of specialized jobs.
